replies.message: Hi Nida. It sounds like you may have used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access Facebook again. In the meantime, you can read more about Facebook policies at: http://on.fb.me/1sQFRvw -Kristen

They restricted my account as well! FOR TWO WEEKS! And I have no clue why... I think it's their new thing to try to control the people that use their site... Apparently they want you to use their site... but not really? Since they want to limit how much you can post and such. It's kind of sad how they are trying to control what we do with our lives and "our" page...
